original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena nakulassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṁ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṁ;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nakulaḥ uragam upagacchantaḥ bhesajjena kāyam paribhāvetvā uragam upagacchati gahetu

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṁ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṁ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṁ anulimpitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kodha āghāta bahulam kalaha viggaha vivāda virodha abhibhūtam lokam upagacchantena mettā bhesajjena mānasam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja nakulassa ekam aṅgam
mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā
